context: Motorola Solutions is a global leader in public safety and enterprise security offering Land Mobile Radio (LMR), Command Center, Video Security and Access Control solutions. Estimated total addressable market over $60 billion. Net sales increased from $2.556B in Q3 2023 to $2.790B in Q3 2024. Operating earnings rose from $639M to $711M. Recent developments: January 2025 - Hytera pleaded guilty to stealing trade secrets and will pay maximum $60M fine plus restitution. November 2025 - acquired Blue Eye (AI-powered enterprise remote video monitoring).
